alert.note: Alert for Cleveland (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 30 at 5:25PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Cleveland and central Dallas Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 525 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles northeast of Sparkman, or 21 miles northwest of Fordyce, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fordyce... Carthage... Princeton... Ivan... Manning... Bunn... Ramsey... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for southeastern and southwestern Arkansas.
